definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: In the process of Sun Chao's research of crystal, he has produced porcelain typical of different dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 孫超研究結晶來由過程中，燒出的歷代陶瓷。

sentences.english: Every Chinese government instituted some protective policies for cattle and horses.
sentences.chinese: 歷代政府對耕牛和馬都給予了保護性的政策。

sentences.english: Some of the Eight Attractions in Guangzhou related to plant landscape were also described.
sentences.chinese: 同時還分析了歷代羊城八景中與植物相關的景點特色。

sentences.english: The third chapter is Zhang Jie's comments on poets of past dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 在第三章，主要考察張戒對歷代詩人的評論。

sentences.english: The collation of the ancient Tibetan medicine books had always received much attention from the Tibetan ruling class.
sentences.chinese: 藏醫藥古籍整理受到歷代藏族統治階級的重視。

sentences.english: The calligraphers inherit and develop on the traditional ancient seal character .
sentences.chinese: 歷代大篆書法家對傳統的繼承和創新。

sentences.english: British kings are crowned in Westminster Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 歷代英國國王皆在西敏寺行加冕禮。

sentences.english: The activities of the Shangsi Festival have varied with times.
sentences.chinese: 上巳節的活動內容，歷代都有變化。

sentences.english: The traditional physicians have different understanding to the pathogenesis of formula's syndrome about Tongxie Yaofang.
sentences.chinese: 歷代醫家對痛瀉藥方的方證病機存在不同的認識。

sentences.english: Just like the dragon, the phoenix was considered as a symbol of power and dignity by ancient monarchs.
sentences.chinese: 鳳和龍一樣，被歷代帝王當作是權力和尊嚴的象徵。

sentences.english: For unlike the great powers of old, we have not sought world domination.
sentences.chinese: 與歷代強國不同，我們沒有追求世界霸權。

sentences.english: There were stringent systems in ancient dynasties for the protection of these ancient cypresses.
sentences.chinese: 保護古柏，歷朝歷代都有嚴格的制度。

sentences.english: The keys to his success are recorded in 2 Chronicles 26.
sentences.chinese: 在歷代志下26章裏記載了他成功的要素。

sentences.english: The third section is called the Memorial Hall, where the tablets for all ancestors are enshrined .
sentences.chinese: 第三進叫做“寢堂”，歷代祖先的牌位在這裏安寢。

sentences.english: All previous dynasties writer literati are many to the peony has only one in mind, chants does not approve already.
sentences.chinese: 歷代文人墨客多對牡丹情有獨鍾，詠贊不已。

sentences.english: Like the books of Chronicles and Ezra, Nehemiah has a priestly emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 一如歷代志和以斯拉二書，尼希米也強調祭司職。

definition: Four Treasures of the Study, namely 筆|笔[bi3], 墨[mo4], 紙|纸[zhi3] and 硯|砚[yan4]/the essentials of calligraphy and scholarship (idiom)
Republic of China (1912-1949)/used in Taiwan as the name of the calendar era (e.g. 民國六十年|民国六十年 is 1971, the 60th year after 1911)
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
the Qin (221-207 BC) and Han (206 BC-220 AD) dynasties
